content: आभा {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To shine, blaze; सुतरां रत्नमाभाति चामीकरनियोजितं <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 33.</ls> {@--2@} To appear, look like; आभासि तीर्थप्रतिपादितर्द्धिः <ls>R. 5. 15</ls>, <ls n="R. 5.">70</ls>, <ls n="R.">13. 14</ls>; <ls>Bk. 7. 8</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 7.">66.</ls> {@--3@} To outshine.

आभा [भा-अङ्] {@--1@} Light, splendour, lustre; दीपाभां शलभा यथा <ls>Pt. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Colour, appearance, beauty; प्रशांतमिव शुद्धाभं <ls>Ms. 12. 27.</ls> {@--3@} Likeness, resemblance; <ab>oft.</ab> at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> in these two senses; रुक्माभं appearnig or shining like gold; यमदूताभं <ls>Pt. 1. 58</ls>; मरुत्सखाभं <ls>R. 2. 10.</ls> {@--4@} A reflected image, shadow, reflection.
